content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Coal Mining Structure at position(x=41, y=-82)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.0, y=-82.0) 
- Coal chest (position x=40.5, y=-83.5) 
- Coal chest (position x=41.5, y=-83.5) 
- Burner inserter (position x=39.5, y=-81.5)

### Furnace Structure at position(x=0, y=0)
Consists of the following entity:
- Furnace (position x=0.0, y=0.0)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when inserting items into a full inventory
- Ensure the inventory of the entity is not full before attempting to insert items.
- Check the warnings for the entity to see if the inventory is full.

### Errors when extracting items
- Ensure the entity has items to extract before attempting to extract.
- Check the warnings for the entity to see if there are any issues with extraction.

### Errors when using undefined variables
- Ensure all variables are defined before using them.
- Check the code for any typos or undefined variables.

### Errors when furnace has no ingredients to smelt
- Ensure the furnace has ingredients to smelt before attempting to smelt.
- Check the warnings for the furnace to see if there are any issues with smelting.

### NAMESPACE
- No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
- Important variables:
  - `coal_chest`: a chest entity used to store coal
  - `drill`: a burner mining drill entity used to mine coal
  - `furnace`: a furnace entity used to smelt items
  - `inserter`: a burner inserter entity used to insert items into other entities
